data.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
At what temperature were the X-ray diffraction data for MOF-1211(Zr/Co) collected?
What is the crystal system of MOF-1212(Hf/Cu)?
What is the space group of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd)?
What is the calculated BET surface area of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
Does MOF-1211(Zr/Co) exhibit permanent porosity?
data.answer: Yes, MOF-1211(Zr/Co) exhibits permanent porosity with a BET surface area of 925 m2/g.

data.question: Is the coordination environment of Cu2+ in MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) octahedral?
data.answer: Yes, the coordination environment of Cu2+ in MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) is octahedral.

data.question: True or False: MOF-1212(Zr/Cu) was synthesized at 85°C.
True or False: The crystal system of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd) is tetragonal.
data.answer: False, the crystal system of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd) is cubic.

data.question: What is the volume of the unit cell for MOF-1212(Hf/Cu)?
What is the final R index for MOF-1210(Zr/Cu) using all data?
True or False: MOF-1211(Zr/Co) has a cubic unit cell with dimensions a = b = c = 15.4249(5) Å.
What is the empirical formula of MOF-1213(Dy/Co)?
True or False: MOF-1212(Zr/Cu) and MOF-1212(Hf/Cu) are isostructural.
What is the space group of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu)?
True or False: The BET surface area of MOF-1211(Zr/Co) is less than that of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu).
data.answer: False, the BET surface area of MOF-1211(Zr/Co) is greater than that of MOF-1210(Zr/Cu).

data.question: What is the formula weight of MOF-1213(Dy/Cd)?
True or False: MOF-1212(Hf/Cu) has a density of 0.859 g/cm3.
What is the largest diff. peak/hole for MOF-1211(Zr/Co)?
True or False: MOF-1213(Dy/Cd) was synthesized at a temperature of 120°C.
